remarks: Deduction used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution, particularly useful in conjunction with ~ dvelim .  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2002.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2016.)  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 13-May-2018.)
statement:
cbvald.1 $e |- F/ y ph $.
cbvald.2 $e |- ( ph -> F/ y ps ) $.
cbvald.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x = y -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
cbvald $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x ps <-> A. y ch ) ) $.
$d ch x $.
$d ph x $.
